comments:
Description:
Fail to pass group key by report parameter.
Build number:2.3.0.v20071129

Steps to reproduce:
1. New data source and dataset.
2. New a report parameter NewParameter.
2. Drag the dataset to Layout
3. Add a group, set group key as params["NewParameter"].
4. Preview and input row["OFFICECODE"] as parameter value

Expected result:
Display table grouped by OFFICECODE

Actual result:
Throw Exception.

Error log:

This is not a valid use case. Report parameter is supposed to be set once and not changed anymore. This is not the very nature that group expected.
